files.description: Provides the single authoritative helper for resolving output directories/paths (default ./outputs, override via OUTPUT_DIR env var) and prevents any absolute /outputs usage.

errors.detail:
, "src/pipeline.py", "src/plotting.py", "src/results_io.py", "src/results_schema.py", "src/run.py", "src/run_artifacts.py", "src/run_pipeline.py", "src/run_toy_experiment.py", "src/schema.py", "src/simulate.py", "src/toy_experiment.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a single authoritative output path helper with OUTPUT_DIR override, safe defaults, directory creation, and a hard ban on absolute /outputs targets.

s.py", "src/outputs.py", "src/pipeline.py", "src/plotting.py", "src/results_io.py", "src/results_schema.py", "src/run.py", "src/run_artifacts.py", "src/run_pipeline.py", "src/run_toy_experiment.py", "src/schema.py", "src/simulate.py", "src/toy_experiment.py"]
Implemented a single, configurable output-path helper that defaults to ./outputs, supports OUTPUT_DIR, and rejects absolute /outputs usage.

SUMMARY: Added documentation standardizing output path resolution via OUTPUT_DIR override and banning absolute /outputs writes.

missionDescription: Standardize output path resolution across the codebase: implement a single output-path helper (defaults to ./outputs, optional OUTPUT_DIR env var) and refactor the pipeline/tests to use it exclusively; eliminate any attempts to write to absolute /outputs.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Multiple execution agents reported that absolute /outputs is not writable, causing inconsistent artifact locations. A unified resolver is required for stable, reviewable deliverables.
